ticket.title: Optional patch bytes backend: integrate existing APM2 CAS as storage (with explicit GC decisions)

tickets.reason: Start with fac_blobs_v1; CAS backend is optional.

in_scope: Add support for `bytes_backend: apm2_cas` in patch injection.
Define how CAS blobs are retained and pruned by FAC GC (explicit allowlist).
Fail-closed if backend is unknown or CAS policies not configured.

steps: Implement explicit FAC GC hooks for CAS paths used.

criteria: CAS-backed patch bytes can be used safely without expanding GC authority to unrelated CAS data.
